headline: Another theme park files for bankruptcy and closes its doors forever
summary: While theme park giants such as Disney and Universal have continued to see high visitor numbers in an uncertain economy, many smaller amusement parks and themed hotels in different parts of the world have struggled with rising operational costs, to the point of having to shut down business. headline: Google Goes Long With 100-Year Bond Sale. We’ve Seen This Before.
summary: Alphabet  the parent company of Google, is playing with both time and debt this week, with plans to raise US$20 billion amid a challenging week for the bond market as part of its larger effort to invest around US$185 billion this year, with more expected after that, on artificial intelligence technologies.  Google’s so-called “century bond” will join a relatively short list of corporate paper sold with a 100-year maturity, including a US$2.5 billion “green bond” offering from  Ford Motor Co  in 2021.  Motorola  which split into two companies in 2011, was the last high-grade company to issue a 100-year bond, selling the paper in 1997.

raw.headline: Google Goes Long With 100-Year Bond Sale. We’ve Seen This Before.

Google’s so-called “century bond” will join a relatively short list of corporate paper sold with a 100-year maturity, including a US$2.5 billion “green bond” offering from  Ford Motor Co  in 2021.  Motorola  which split into two companies in 2011, was the last high-grade company to issue a 100-year bond, selling the paper in 1997.

headline: Google to join exclusive 100 club with century-long bond
summary: Google’s parent company plans to become one of a select group of institutions to borrow money for a century, issuing a 100-year bond in sterling.

headline: Is There Now An Opportunity In Walt Disney (DIS) After Its Five Year Share Price Slump
summary: If you are wondering whether Walt Disney's share price really reflects what the business is worth today, looking closely at how the market is valuing it can be a useful starting point. The stock last closed at US$108.70, with returns of 4.1% over the past week, a 6.2% decline over the last month, a 2.8% decline year to date, a 0.6% gain over one year and a 40.7% decline over five years. Recent coverage around Walt Disney has focused on its ongoing transformation of the company, including...

headline: Haveli To Acquire Budge Studios, Leading Mobile Developer of Digital Interactive Entertainment for Children
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, February 09, 2026--Haveli Investments, L.P. ("Haveli" or "Haveli Investments"), a technology and gaming-focused private equity firm, today announced that it has entered into an agreement to acquire Budge Studios, a leader in digital interactive entertainment for children, from General Atlantic, a leading global investor.
